question: Display screenwriters and playwrights who graduated from New York University.
sql_query1:
SELECT Screenwriters.name
FROM Screenwriters
WHERE Screenwriters.Education = "New York University"
UNION
SELECT Playwrights.name
FROM Playwrights
WHERE Playwrights.Education = "New York University"
sql_query2:
SELECT Screenwriters.name
FROM Screenwriters
UNION
SELECT Playwrights.name
FROM Playwrights
WHERE Playwrights.Education = "New York University"
interpretation1: Which screenwriters and playwrights graduated from New York University?
interpretation2: List all screenwriters and also display playwrights graduated from New York University.
